column4: evolution comes up with first-start-config again - how to rescue?
what problems have you had before it came up
has evolution been working ok for a while? (have you done any updates etc?)
mm one thing to try is closing the wizard and trying to launch from a terminal window, see if there is any errors
does it launch the wizard again?
thats strange.. does running "ls ~.evolution/mail/local/Inbox.sbd/" from a terminal work?
sounds like your evolution dir has gone for some reason.... has anything else on your system gone back to defaults by any chance? does ls ~/.evolution work?
only thing I can suggest (unless any one has any ideas) is to follow the wizard putting in the same settings as you did before.. it may pick up your existing mail from those dirs
